conbody.p: The parameters for configuring a SMS server are listed in the following table.

note.p: After updating SMS server configurations, the application server must be restarted for the changes to take effect.

row.entry: A unique name for the SMPP server. This is used as the primary key. It can have a maximum of 50 characters.
The primary host-name or IP address of the SMPP server.
The secondary-host name or IP address of the SMPP server.

entry.p: The port on which SMPP server is listening.
The type of binding expected with the SMPP server.
The segmentation method used when SMS text exceeds the defined limit.
Valid values: Short Message Segmentation, Message Payload
The type of number for source address.
Valid values: Unknown, Abbreviated, Alphanumeric, International, National, Network, Subscriber
The numeric plan indicator for source address.
Valid values: Unknown, E.164, ERMES, Internet, ISDN, Land Mobile, National, Private, Telex, WAP Client Identifier, X121
The type of number for destination address.
Valid values: Unknown, Abbreviated, Alphanumeric, International, National, Network, Subscriber
The numeric plan indicator used for destination address.
Valid values: Unknown, E.164, ERMES, Internet, ISDN, Land Mobile, National, Private, Telex, WAP Client Identifier, X121
The type of ESME system requesting to bind as a transceiver with the SMPP server.
The time lapse (in milliseconds) allowed between an SMPP request and the corresponding SMPP response.
Time (in milliseconds) to wait before sending the QUERY_SM request.
The time lapse (in milliseconds) allowed between operations after which an SMPP server checks whether its peer still has an active session.
The maximum number of messages that can be sent to SMSC server without receiving a response.

row.entry: The source mobile number. The subscribers will see this number as originator of SMS.
The system ID used to authenticate the bind request. Only integers are allowed. The maximum length of this field is 16 characters.
The password used to authenticate the bind request. The maximum length of this field is 100 characters.
The additional information such as a restriction about the parameter.
